#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<vector>
#include<queue>
#include<map>
#include<cstring>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cmath>
#include<limits.h>
#include<list>
#include<stack>
using namespace std;
 
#define ll long long int
#define llu unsigned long long
#define mod 1000000009
#define MAX 1000008
#define pb push_back
bool cmp(int x,int y){
	return x>y;
}
void reverse(int *x){
	int m=*x;
	*x=0;
	while(m){
		int rem=(m)%10;
		(*x)=(*x)*10+rem;
		m/=10;
	}
}
ll a[8];
int main(){
	int i;
	for(i=1;i<=6;i++)
		cin>>a[i];
	ll x=0;
	ll x1=a[1]+a[2]+a[3];
	ll x2=a[2]+a[3]+a[4];
	ll x3=a[3]+a[4]+a[5];
	ll x4=a[4]+a[5]+a[6];
	//ll x5=a[5]+a[6]+a[1];
	//ll x6=a[6]+a[1]+a[2];
	x^=x1;
	x^=x2;
	x^=x3;
	x^=x4;
	//x^=x5;
//	x^=x6;
	
	if(x)
		cout<<"Winning";
	else
		cout<<"Losing";
		
	return 0;
}
